text: khea klaw wa “xok lum chn khxng chan xey! Phwk than mi hen dxk hrux hak chan mi hlakthan xan chad cæng cak phracea khxng chan læa phraxngkh thrng prathan khwam metta cak phraxngkh kæ chan dangnan phu dı lea ca chwy chan hı phn ca kxallxh hak chan fafun phraxngkh dangnan phwk than ca mi pheim sing dı hı kæ chan ley nxkcak kar khadthun theanan
